text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Trump had nothing to do with people returning to their old jobs after furloughs due to the Covid19 crisis.  Congratulations is not in order. We are still in the worse unemployment rates and economy since the great depression.  BYEDON 2020. Vote Joe Biden,  Joe will bring us back
